name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-personal-anniversary-counter
title: Personal Anniversary Web Part
shortDescription: A web part to help you notice those special days
longDescription: Recently we had a fun talk at the office, 'how many days have I been working here?' turns out the answer was almost exactly 1500 days. So I thought it would be fun to make a web part that could help you keep track of those fun days.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
